content.en_US:
Obtained by the [[fractioning|Fractioning Tower]] of [[heavy oil|Heavy Oil]], it can be further fractionated into [[heating oil|Heating Oil]] and [[lubricant|Engine Lubricant]]. It is used for producing petroil.

Alternatively, it is [[cracked|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] to produce [[naphtha|Naphtha]] and [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]].
